definitions.definition: To express (something) in a compact or condensed manner , especially in the style of journalism generally associated with a tabloid newspaper ( appealing to unsophisticated people , sensational , etc.).
To convert (a newspaper) into a tabloid (noun sense 2.3 ) format .

main_definition: To express (something) in a compact or condensed manner , especially in the style of journalism generally associated with a tabloid newspaper ( appealing to unsophisticated people , sensational , etc.).
secondary_definitions: ( newspapers ) To convert (a newspaper) into a tabloid (noun sense 2.3 ) format .
